item.title: Analzying 2018 and 2020 House Vote Shares
item.description: This is blog post #1 in a series of analytical posts in lieu of the 2022 midterms. This post is affiliated with Gov 1347: Election Analytics, a course at Harvard University in the department of Government. Swing state map extension. Instead of plotting voteshare-margin maps for each year y where the color for a state is colored, plot a swing map for each year where each state is colored by the quantity RyDy+Ry−Ry−4Dy−4+Ry−4.
